## scale22 variable

Computes 2x2 matrix scale matrix and writes result to `out`<!-- -->. If `s` is a number, scaling will be uniform.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scale22: (m: import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec | null, s: number | import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec
```
